text:
Jerome Michael Adams (born September 22, 1974) is an American anesthesiologist. He is the 20th and current Surgeon General of the United States since September 2017.
Before assuming his current role, he served as the Indiana State Health Commissioner from 2014 to 2017. On June 29, 2017, President Donald Trump nominated Adams to become Surgeon General of the United States. Adams was confirmed by the United States Senate on August 3, 2017.

annotations.surface_form: Surgeon General of the United States
